sentences.en: " Therefore, the corrosion is caused by erosion of rainwater during ocean shipping. "
sentences.cn: 因此, 这些腐蚀是海运途中雨水的侵蚀造成的.

sentences.en: Entirely is the rainwater inside the tent, we have all jumped inside the sleeping bag.
sentences.cn: 帐篷内全是雨水, 我们都从睡袋里跳了出来.

sentences.en: Farmers say they need less rainwater if they use fertilizer trees.
sentences.cn: 农民们说，如果它们使用肥料树，就只需要很少的雨水。

sentences.en: I am sure nobody will enjoy eating dry food and drinking rainwater.
sentences.cn: 我确信没人愿意吃干粮喝雨水.

sentences.en: I swept rainwater off the flat top of a gravestone.
sentences.cn: 我拂去了墓碑顶上的雨水。
雨水引发保险丝烧熔，使得灯泡都不亮了。

sentences.en: The rainwater dripped through a crack on the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 雨水从天花板的裂缝中滴下.

sentences.en: The rainwater ran along the gutter into a grating at the side of the road.
sentences.cn: 雨水沿着排水沟流入了路边的阴沟格栅.

sentences.en: The soil can absorb the rainwater.
There were cisterns to catch rainwater as it ran off the castle walls.
sentences.cn: 雨水顺着城堡的墙壁流下时会流入蓄水池。

sentences.en: Use a soda can to collect and store rainwater.
sentences.cn: 这时可以用易拉罐收集并存储雨水.

sentences.en: Water pollution into streams will be reduced because large volumes of rainwater will be harvested for reuse instead of entering the water pollution cycle.
sentences.cn: 社区将通过这一创新的项目获益，减少污水进入小河，大量的雨水被收集重新使用,不使水循环污染 .

sentences.en: Whose job is it to clear the accumulated rainwater from the streets?
sentences.cn: 清除街道上淤积的雨水是谁的工作?

trans.tran_en: water that has fallen as rain
